objectives: Identify and recall key vocabulary related to listening to podcasts
Understand main ideas in conversations about listening to podcasts

multiple_intelligences.linguistic: Write a story or essay about listening to podcasts
multiple_intelligences.logical_mathematical: Analyze patterns and create logical arguments about listening to podcasts
multiple_intelligences.spatial: Create visual representations or mind maps of listening to podcasts
multiple_intelligences.bodily_kinesthetic: Role-play or act out scenarios related to listening to podcasts
multiple_intelligences.musical: Create a song or rhythm exercise about listening to podcasts
multiple_intelligences.interpersonal: Collaborate in groups to discuss listening to podcasts
multiple_intelligences.intrapersonal: Reflect individually on personal connection to listening to podcasts
multiple_intelligences.naturalistic: Categorize and classify concepts related to listening to podcasts

content.basic: Simplified texts and basic vocabulary about listening to podcasts
content.intermediate: Standard complexity materials with support about listening to podcasts
content.advanced: Complex authentic materials and academic texts about listening to podcasts

process.grouping: Individual, pairs, small groups, or whole class based on preference
process.choice: Multiple activity options aligned with learning style

differentiation.environment: Open space allowing movement and hands-on activities

warm_up.description: Students move around and interact physically related to listening to podcasts
warm_up.materials: Space for movement, props if needed

main_activities.description: Students receive information about listening to podcasts through kinesthetic modality
Students practice language related to listening to podcasts using kinesthetic approach
Students produce original content about listening to podcasts demonstrating basic thinking

discussion_prompts: Can you describe listening to podcasts?
What do you know about listening to podcasts?

vocabulary_support.tier_2: Academic and topic-specific words for listening to podcasts
vocabulary_support.tier_3: Domain-specific technical terms related to listening to podcasts

homework_options.required: Core assignment at basic level using kinesthetic approach

teacher_notes.grouping_suggestions: Flexible grouping based on readiness and interest
teacher_notes.time_management: Build in flexibility for different pacing needs

common_difficulties: Students may lack background knowledge about listening to podcasts
Vocabulary may be challenging for some students
Some students may need more processing time
methodology: UDL + Differentiated Instruction + CLT + Multiple Intelligences
references: CAST Universal Design for Learning Guidelines
